section.title: Updated schedule.init
section.para: has been improved to allow specification of an optional sampling rule, so the initialization action can apply to a nondeterministic subset of a given group.

section.title: Improved tidy button
section.para: In the web interface, the source code tidy button's algorithm has been improved so that it will try and preserve the line breaks that are present in the scenario.

section.title: Addition of action.case
section.para: has been added, which lets you choose between several actions by testing a boolean condition.

section.section:
Updated finance.with-obligation
has been updated to allow capturing of values at the time when the obligation is created, for use when evaluating the amount of the obligation.

Added low energy lighting measure.
replaces incandescent bulbs with CFL bulbs.

section.title: Expose Household income.
section.para: Added numeric value exposing the total income before tax for a house hold.

section.title: Expose occupants length of residence
section.para: Added numeric value exposing how long the current occupants have been living in the survey-case.

section.title: Test whether a house has radiators.
section.para: Added a Boolean function defining whether a house has radiators or not. Based on centeral heating system being present and emitters being radiators.
